tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (RB No) (JJR better) (NN way)) (VP (TO to) (VP (VB spend) (NP (DT a) (JJ rainy) (NNP Sunday) (NN morning)) (PP (IN than) (S (VP (VBG updating) (NP (DT the) (NNP Environmental) (NNP Working) (NNP Group) (NNP Activity) (NNP Plan))))))) (. .)))
